targets.query: SELECT mean("current_subscriber_count") FROM "BNG_PPPOE_INFRA" WHERE $timeFilter group by time(60s)
SELECT ("schedb_queues_allocated"/"schedb_queues_max")*100 FROM "BNG_PPPOE_INFRA" WHERE ("slot"::tag =~ /^$fpc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "slot"::tag, "pfe_no"::tag, "sblock_no"::tag

targets.alias: Filter Memory Utili. FPC Slot $tag_slot PFE $tag_pfe_no

panels.title: Per PFE Filter Mem - FPC Slot $fpc

targets.alias: FW Memory Used FPC Slot $tag_slot PFE $tag_pfe_no
targets.query: SELECT 100-"pfe_fw_memory_free" FROM "BNG_PPPOE_INFRA" WHERE ("slot"::tag =~ /^$fpc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pfe_no"::tag, "slot"::tag

panels.title: Per PFE FW Memory Used - FPC Slot $fpc

targets.alias: NH Memory Used FPC Slot $tag_slot PFE $tag_pfe_no
targets.query: SELECT 100-"pfe_nh_memory_free" FROM "BNG_PPPOE_INFRA" WHERE ("slot"::tag =~ /^$fpc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pfe_no"::tag, "slot"::tag

panels.title: Per PFE NH Memory Used - FPC Slot $fpc

targets.alias: IFL Memory Used FPC Slot $tag_slot PFE $tag_pfe_no
targets.query: SELECT "pfe_ifl_memory_used" FROM "BNG_PPPOE_INFRA" WHERE ("slot"::tag =~ /^$fpc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pfe_no"::tag, "slot"::tag

panels.title: Per PFE IFL Memory Used - FPC Slot $fpc

targets.alias: Expansion Memory Used FPC Slot $tag_slot PFE $tag_pfe_no
targets.query: SELECT "pfe_expansion_memory_used" FROM "BNG_PPPOE_INFRA" WHERE ("slot"::tag =~ /^$fpc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pfe_no"::tag, "slot"::tag

panels.title: Per PFE Expansion Memory Used - FPC Slot $fpc

targets.alias: Queues Allocated FPC Slot $tag_slot PFE $tag_pfe_no SchedB $tag_sblock_no
targets.query: SELECT "pfe_expansion_memory_used" FROM "BNG_PPPOE_INFRA" WHERE ("slot"::tag =~ /^$fpc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pfe_no"::tag, "slot"::tag

list.definition: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE with key="device"
list.label: Router
list.name: rtr
list.query: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE with key="device"

list.definition: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE_INFRA with key="slot" where device=~/$rtr/
list.label: FPC Slot
list.name: fpc
list.query: show tag values from BNG_PPPOE_INFRA with key="slot" where device=~/$rtr/
